about: Our courses have been specifically designed around the unique way children learn and are taught by experienced teachers who are passionate about the English language and experts in teaching children.

Are you looking for an easy way to help your child improve his/her penmanship skills and legibility?  Handwriting Improvement for Kids is the perfect solution!
 This course is specifically designed for 2nd through 5th grade students looking to improve their penmanship skills.
